name: Sit with Death
description:
Inspired by An Invitation to Sit with Death Awhile, an intimate interactive performance installation which premiered at Deathfest 2016.

I want to created an intimate space to sit with Death and talk openly about your feelings towards her.  She will give you prompts on the subject and give you space to talk about it or sit in silence.  Will you accept her invitation?

This game encourages you, as in physical person you, to complete these actions and talk (or think) about death.  Please, raise you hand to your heart or your belly, and really think about these questions.  This is the space to do it.

Notes: Pressing escape will immediately quit the game.  The Mac build is currently untested so if there are any issues please let me know.
